Package com.mozilla.secops.httprequest

HTTP request threshold and error rate monitoring

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions
    Runtime options for HTTPRequest pipeline.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPRequest
    HTTPRequest describes and implements a Beam pipeline for analysis of HTTP requests using log data.
    HTTPRequest.Has4xxRequestStatus
    Function to be used with filter transform in order to include only client errors
    HTTPRequest.KeyAndWindowForSessionsFireEarly
    Key requests for session analysis and window into sessions
    HTTPRequest.WindowForFixed
    Window events into fixed one minute windows
    HTTPRequestElementFilter
    Post-input filter for per-element analysis
    HTTPRequestMetrics
    HTTPRequestMetrics contains metrics for the HTTPRequest pipeline.
    HTTPRequestMetrics.HeuristicMetrics
    Metrics for the various analysis transforms in HTTPRequest pipeline
    HTTPRequestMultiMode
    HTTPRequest multimode configuration
    HTTPRequestResourceTag
    Add monitored resource indicator
    HTTPRequestToggles
    Configuration toggles for HTTPRequest pipeline analysis

Package com.mozilla.secops.httprequest Description
